publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5030 Cathy Peattie: Tackling the Diversity Deficit—That the Parliament is pleased to host the Commission for Racial Equality’s policy reception, entitled "Tackling the Diversity Deficit in Scottish Politics", on 7 November 2006, which will bring MSPs together with individuals from across Scotland to explore why some ethnic groups are under-represented in Scottish politics and what can be done to address this, and is committed to engaging all of Scotland’s citizens in Scotland’s decision-making processes and to continuing to encourage the engagement of under-represented groups, particularly ethnic minorities, in all aspects of the Parliament’s work.

S2M-5030*#* Cathy Peattie: Tackling the Diversity Deficit—That the Parliament is pleased to host the Commission for Racial Equality’s policy reception, entitled "Tackling the Diversity Deficit in Scottish Politics", on 7 November 2006, which will bring MSPs together with individuals from across Scotland to explore why some ethnic groups are under-represented in Scottish politics and what can be done to address this, and is committed to engaging all of Scotland’s citizens in Scotland’s decision-making processes and to continuing to encourage the engagement of under-represented groups, particularly ethnic minorities, in all aspects of the Parliament’s work. Supported by: Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*, Nora Radcliffe*, Kate Maclean*, Maureen Macmillan*, Rob Gibson*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Bruce Crawford*, Sarah Boyack*, Patrick Harvie*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Cathie Craigie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Trish Godman*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*, John Swinburne*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Shiona Baird*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Robin Harper*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Marilyn Livingstone*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-5030# Tackling the Diversity Deficit (lodged on 27 October 2006) Karen Whitefield*
